sentences.sContent: the materialistic values of American society
sentences.sCn: 美国社会的实利主义价值观

words.tran: 唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义
唯物主义者；实利主义者

trans.tranCn: 唯物主义的；唯物论的；金钱至上的
trans.tranOther: concerned only with money and possessions rather than things of the mind such as art, religion, or moral beliefs – used in order to show disapproval
